original_title: And with Him Came the West
overview: Wyatt Earp, one of the most famous lawmen and gamblers of the Old West, is the inspiration behind decades of Hollywood Westerns. This documentary, written by director Plante along with Sam Green and Tim Kirk, highlights the influence of Earpâ€™s legacy on cinema and our perception of the wild, wild West.
title: And with Him Came the West
